sentences.sContent: Some of his most powerful writing is based on his childhood experiences.
sentences.sCn: 他的一些最震慑人心的作品是根据儿时经历写成的。

sentences.sContent: ...Dear teacher，I am writing to express my appreciation for the generous help you rendered to me since I entered this university...
...I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude for the continuous assistance you and your family have offered to me these years...
...So are you fast at writing the messages with your thumb...
...Somewhere along the way I set aside my hopes of writing that flawless essay...
...A writer should polish his writing repeatedly so as to get closer to perfection...
...and what stuck with me through my time teaching writing at Harvard...
...Perhaps the point of writing the flawless essay was not to give up...
...I was lucky enough to find a critic and teacher who was willing to make the journey of writing with me...
...The author gradually improved his writing by avoiding fancy language...
...A survey shows that 63% of employers say that recent college graduates don't have the sldlls they need to succeed and 25% of employers say that entry-level writing skills are lacking...

synos.tran: 书写；作品；[图情]著作；[法]笔迹

phrases.pCn: 写作技巧；书写技能；笔头
书写系统，文字系统；书写体系
书信写法；书信写作；尺牍
n. 直写，直接描画；直描式；直接业务

trans.tranOther: books, poems, articles etc, especially those by a particular writer or about a particular subject
